activities: Worldwide Compensation, Inc. (the “Company) offers performance-driven-total-compensation-planning-software which enables companies to precision-target rewards to drive the behavior they require to achieve critical business results. The Company manages base pay information, unlimited bonuses, and several types of stock in a single platform.  The Company receives data from employers throughout Europe, including employee names, employee email addresses and employer generated compensation, including salary, bonus and stock information, as well as organizational information.
eucountries: France, Germany, Latvia, Netherlands, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line and manually processed; HR data
